author: shimashimarin
body: Bumping up Sherpa to 2.2.15 based on the discussion [here](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/sherpa-event-generation-segfault-with-privately-generated-sherpack-for-z-jets/23629/9). Also, this is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8450.
title: [12_6_X] bumping up sherpa to 2.2.15
